verses.name: Jeremiah 5:28
verses.text: They are waxen fat, they shine: yea, they overpass the deeds of the wicked: they judge not the cause, the cause of the fatherless, yet they prosper; and the right of the needy do they not judge.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:29
verses.text: Shall I not visit for these things? saith the Lord: shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:30
verses.text: A wonderful and horrible thing is committed in the land;

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:31
verses.text: The prophets prophesy falsely, and the priests bear rule by their means; and my people love to have it so: and what will ye do in the end thereof?
